SELECT DH_ID, C_ID, C_NAME, COUNT(DISTINCT RESERVATION.O_ID) RCOUNT, TO_CHAR(D_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') D_DATE, SUM(PRICE) PRICE FROM DEPOSIT_HISTORY JOIN COMPANY USING(C_ID) JOIN ROOM USING(C_ID) JOIN RESERVATION USING(R_ID) JOIN PAYMENT USING(PA_ID) JOIN PAY_DETAIL USING(PA_ID) WHERE COMPANY.M_ID = #{mId} GROUP BY DH_ID, C_ID, O_ID, C_NAME, TO_CHAR(D_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY D_DATE DESC
